SEARCH
Package de.tum.cit.ase.maze.GameComponents

Class GameEntities

java.lang.Object
de.tum.cit.ase.maze.GameComponents.GameEntities
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bullet, Enemy, Key, Player, Traps
public class GameEntities extends Object
This is the superclass for all entities in the game. It contains common properties and methods that all game entities share.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    boolean
    destroyFlAG
    Flag to indicate whether the entity should be destroyed.

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update()
      Updates the state of the entity. This method should be overridden by subclasses to provide entity-specific update behavior.

      Parameters:

    • box

      public BoundingBox box()
      Returns a bounding box that encloses the entity. The bounding box is used for collision detection and other similar operations.
      Returns:
      The bounding box of the entity.

    • draw

      public void draw(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Batch batch)
      Draws the entity on the specified batch.
      Parameters:
      batch - The batch on which to draw the entity.
